attributes.action: reverse the decision to close HMRC offices in Harlow and Huntingdon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and retain only small public enquiry points in both towns. Although HMRC has guarenteed a full service to the public, this will be not available to over 28,000 members of the public who currently use this service without the support of back office staff. As unemployment rises due to the economic crisis the staff in both towns face an uncertain future as not all staff can move to another office and their options are limited.
